name: Smart water bottle with hydration tracker
alternateName: Smart water bottle that reminds you to drink
description: The Voxpure Smart Water Bottle integrates deep-cycle UV-C sterilization with intelligent hydration tracking. It reminds users to drink water every 90 minutes, displays live water temperature, and uses a multi-mode LED ring for hydration alerts. Ideal for daily use, travel, gym, and eco-lifestyle goals, Voxpure combines health, tech, and sustainability in one lab-certified BPA-free bottle.
evidenceLevel: Scientific laboratory testing and ISO/IEC 17025-accredited certification
